entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow and ending late this evening then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
